message: Import statement for 'com.google.common.base.Strings' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting group 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.servlet.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest'.
